message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SD 

This paper is about automatic speech recognition using deep learning techniques, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Specifically, the paper focuses on evaluating the performance of these techniques on the task of English broadcast news speech recognition. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which includes papers on NLP and speech processing. 

The paper also involves the use of neural networks, which falls under the category of machine learning (ML). Therefore, cs.SD (Sound) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are also likely categories. 

Additionally, the paper involves the use of language models, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (AI). Therefore, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also a likely category. 

Finally, the paper involves the evaluation of recognition performance, which falls under the category of signal processing (SP). Therefore, cs.SP (Signal Processing) is a less likely but still possible category.
